lead_paragraph: Swansea City manager Francesco Guidolin is still in hospital recovering from a chest infection and will miss his second Premier League match in a row when the Welsh club host Norwich City on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: Swansea Boss Guidolin Still in Hospital
headline.main: Swansea Boss Guidolin Still in Hospital

snippet: Swansea City manager Francesco Guidolin is still in hospital recovering from a chest infection and will miss his second Premier League match in a row when the Welsh club host Norwich City on Saturday....
